io.github.rubenchristoffer.hetty.filters

Class HTTPFormDataFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rubenchristoffer.hetty.filters.HTTPPacketFilter
      • io.github.rubenchristoffer.hetty.filters.HTTPFormDataFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeepCloneable<HTTPPacketFilter>

    public class HTTPFormDataFilter
extends HTTPPacketFilter
    HTTP filter that aids in posting forms. It will replace body with properly encoded body (uses HTTPConfig.FORM_DATA_CHARSET for encoding) based on formdata and set header content-type to 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'.
    Author:
    Ruben Christoffer

      • filter

        public void filter(HTTPPacket packet,
                   URL url)
        Description copied from class: HTTPPacketFilter
        Filters the packet. This may include adding / removing / modifying header fields or body. It may also do nothing if certain criteria is not fulfilled.
        Specified by:
        filter in class HTTPPacketFilter
        Parameters:
        packet - is the packet you want to filter
        url - is the URL you are sending the packet to
